meanings.definition: Working together in a cooperative manner to produce a combined effect greater than the sum of their separate effects.
meanings.sent1: The team showed synergetic effort in completing the project ahead of schedule.
meanings.sent2: The synergetic collaboration between the two departments led to a successful product launch.
meanings.sent3: It was quite synergetic to see the cats and dogs playing together in harmony.
meanings.sent4: The synergetic relationship between music and emotions is truly fascinating.
meanings.sent5: The synergetic dance performance left the audience in awe of the seamless coordination.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to synergy or synergism.
meanings.sent1: The company's synergetic approach to problem-solving impressed the clients.
meanings.sent2: The synergetic effects of the new treatment were evident in the patients' recovery.
meanings.sent3: It seemed almost synergetic how the colors of the painting blended perfectly.
meanings.sent4: The synergetic nature of the ecosystem highlighted the delicate balance of life.
meanings.sent5: The synergetic interaction between the characters made the story captivating to read.
